suite.name: CarouselText

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

arguments.arg: TuneIn | Free Internet Radio | NFL, Sports, Podcasts, Music & News

kw.msg: Page title is 'TuneIn | Free Internet Radio | NFL, Sports, Podcasts, Music & News'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath://div[@data-testid='heroCarouselTextContainer0']//a[@data-testid='line1']' contains exact text 'MORE JAZZ.'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath://div[@data-testid='heroCarouselTextContainer0']//a[@data-testid='line2']' contains exact text 'LESS ADS.'.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath://div[@data-testid='heroCarouselTextContainer0']//a[@data-testid='line3']' contains exact text 'GO PREMIUM.'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc: Verification of the text lines for each slide for the carousel
